text: Attila Sahin (born 24 October 1973) is a retired Turkish-Swiss football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss people of Turkish descent Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Basel players Category:Göztepe S.K. footballers Category:FC Winterthur players Category:SR Delémont players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Süper Lig players
title: Attila Sahin
